function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the concept of 15-10-5-min community life circle","Impact":"Ineffective utilization of community services and facilities","Mitigation":"Provide clear and detailed explanations of the concept and its benefits to the community members","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, informational videos, community workshops","People":"Community residents, property managers, committee members","Owner":"Community management team"},{"Description":"Mixed online and offline questionnaires leading to data inconsistencies","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and conclusions due to conflicting data sources","Mitigation":"Standardize questionnaire formats and data collection methods, cross-validate online and offline responses","Technologies":"Centralized data collection platforms, automated data analysis tools","People":"Data collectors, analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Field survey interviews potentially increasing exposure to contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of spreading or contracting contagious diseases during face-to-face interactions","Mitigation":"Utilize protective equipment, maintain social distancing, conduct virtual interviews where possible","Technologies":"Video conferencing tools, virtual interview platforms, contactless survey tools","People":"Community residents, property managers, committee members, survey interviewers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
